alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 10:01AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern St. Louis and northern Carlton Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 1000 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Eveleth, to Meadowlands, to 9 miles southwest of Floodwood, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Eveleth and Gilbert around 1005 AM CDT. Cotton and Canyon around 1015 AM CDT. Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area around 1020 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Brookston, Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, Whiteface Reservoir, Cloquet, Scanlon, Fairbanks, Boulder Lake, Island Lake and Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore
